title: Tokyo Ghoul 'S'
overview: Now a member of Anteiku, Ken Kaneki grows closer to the ghouls around him. Determined to protect his new home against anti-ghoul forces, he trains his powers in secret. But when the infamous gourmet, ShÅ« Tsukiyama, wishes to savour some half-ghoul flavour, Kaneki's training is put to test of a lifetime.
